description: An African-American woman is seated at a bar with a purse slung over her shoulder. A glass contianing a drink over ice and a can of Pepsi-Cola are on the bar.
marks:
Signature, Date and Inscription

LRC, in pencil, Signed and dated in pencil, LRC; [Guinan \'85]
provenance: Gift of the artist to Robert Patrick Atherton, Minneapolis, c. 1985; the Estate of Robert Patrick Atherton, Minneapolis, 2010, bequethed to the MIA, December 2010
title: Pepsi-Cola II
